Product.Name: Inference Engine
Product.Description: An execution engine that delivers inference solutions on embedded platforms. Provides an embedded-friendly scoring solution that optimizes execution for target hardware.

Product.Name: Model Optimizer
Product.Description: A command-line tool that imports trained models from popular deep learning frameworks and enhances them for improved execution, storage and transmission.

Product.Name: Deep Learning Workbench
Product.Description: A web-based graphical environment to profile the performance of deep learning models with sample datasets on various Intel® architecture configurations (CPU, GPU, VPU).

Product.Name: Intel(R) Media SDK
Product.Description: Intel(R) Media SDK provides software development tools and libraries needed to develop enterprise grade media solutions on Intel(R) Xeon(R) and Core(TM) processor-based platforms. For OpenVINO(TM) toolkit components, this SDK offers access to hardware accelerated video codecs and frame processing.

Component.Name: Intel(R) Media SDK
Component.Description: Intel(R) Media SDK provides software development tools and libraries needed to develop enterprise grade media solutions on Intel(R) Xeon(R) and Core(TM) processor-based platforms. For OpenVINO(TM) toolkit components, this SDK offers access to hardware accelerated video codecs and frame processing.
